mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS t_user ( `id` bigint unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `nickname` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL, `mobile` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL, `gmt_create` datetime NOT NULL ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `gmt_modified` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY ( `id` ) ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8mb4 COLLATE = utf8mb4_bin;
